abstract: Port of Los Angeles Police Chief Ronald J Boyd is indicted on federal charges of wire fraud in connection with project to develop Portwatch, social networking program meant to help reduce port crime.
lead_paragraph: The chief, Ronald J. Boyd, who was named in a federal grand jury indictment with charges of wire fraud, is to surrender to federal agents next week.

headline.main: Port of Los Angeles Police Chief Is Charged in Fraud Case
headline.print_headline: Police Chief Is Charged in Fraud Case

snippet: The chief, Ronald J. Boyd, who was named in a federal grand jury indictment with charges of wire fraud, is to surrender to federal agents next week.
